subject: svn commit: samba-docs r1101 - in trunk/manpages-3: .
body:
Author: kseeger
Date: 2007-04-20 10:33:56 +0000 (Fri, 20 Apr 2007)
New Revision: 1101

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba-docs&rev=1101

Log:
Add documentation for new net sam subcommand deletelocalgroup.
Modified:
   trunk/manpages-3/net.8.xml


Changeset:
Modified: trunk/manpages-3/net.8.xml
===================================================================
--- trunk/manpages-3/net.8.xml	2007-04-17 22:38:52 UTC (rev 1100)
+++ trunk/manpages-3/net.8.xml	2007-04-20 10:33:56 UTC (rev 1101)
@@ -941,6 +941,16 @@
 

+SAM DELETELOCALGROUP <NAME>
+
+
+Delete an existing LOCAL group (also known as Alias).
+
+
+
+
+
+
SAM MAPUNIXGROUP <NAME>
